alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Martin; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 7:16AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Dense Fog Developing Across Portions of East Central Florida... At 715 AM, surface observations, satellite imagery, and traffic cameras showed dense fog developing in Osceola, Okeechobee, southern Brevard, Indian River, Saint Lucie, and Martin counties. Fog was reducing visibility to less than one mile, with locally dense fog reducing visibility to one quarter mile at times. This fog is expected to clear over the next two to three hours. Motorists driving this morning should prepare to encounter rapidly decreasing visibility in fog. When driving in dense fog, reduce your speed, use only low beam headlights, and leave extra following distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.
